1:
Yahweh, rescue me from being attacked by evil men;\q2 even more, keep me safe from being attacked by violent people.
\q1
2:
They are always planning to do evil things,\q2 and they are always encouraging people to start quarrels.
\q1
3:
By what they say, they injure people as poisonous snakes do.


\q1
4:
Yahweh, protect me from the power of wicked people.\q2 Keep me safe from violent men who plan to ruin me.
\q1
6:
I say to you, "Yahweh, you are my God.\q2 Listen to me while I cry out to you to help me."
\q1
7:
Yahweh, my Lord, you are the one who strongly defends me;\q2 you have protected me during battles as though you had put a helmet on my head.
\q1
8:
Yahweh, do not give to wicked people the things that they desire,\q2 and do not allow them to do the evil things that they plan to do.



\q1
9:
Do not allow my enemies to become proud;\q2 cause the evil things that they say they will do to me to happen to them instead.
\q1
10:
Cause burning coals to fall on their heads!\q2 Cause them to be thrown into deep pits from which they cannot climb out!
\q1
11:
Do not allow those who slander others to succeed;\q2 cause evil things to happen to violent men and destroy them!



\q1
12:
Yahweh, I know that you will defend those who are oppressed,\q2 and that you will do what is just.
\q1
13: Righteous people will surely thank you,\q2 and they will live in your presence.
